summary: The diff adds a React documentation hub with sidebar navigation, a dedicated “Platform & Limitations” section, an OTP extraction playground (extract/copy + clipboard auto-clear scheduling), and a green/emerald privacy-focused theme. However, some BuildRequest acceptance criteria cannot be confirmed from the truncated diffs, and several unrelated/auth/network-capable features were added that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: All eight documentation deliverables are present (architecture, permissions, OTP detection + rationale, regex/heuristics, Kotlin snippets, UI screen specs, compliance checklist, privacy policy outline) and easy to navigate.
missing_requirements.reason: Navigation items for all deliverables exist, but the actual content for most sections is truncated in the diff; only the Overview and Platform & Limitations sections are shown with partial content, so the presence/coverage of the remaining deliverables cannot be verified from the provided evidence.
evidence: frontend/src/docs/docsContent.ts (truncated) — shows Overview and Platform & Limitations; remainder truncated

missing_requirements.requirement: Non-OTP input does not produce a code and clearly indicates no OTP was detected.
missing_requirements.reason: The playground component is truncated right after the extracted OTP rendering branch begins; there is no visible evidence of a specific UI state/message for the 'no OTP detected' case.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include a user-configurable auto-clear clipboard timer setting (e.g., 15s/30s/60s/never).
missing_requirements.reason: The playground imports Select components and uses a stored clearDelay, but the truncated file does not show the actual Select options (15/30/60/never) rendered in the UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider and identity management hooks added to the frontend app.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is for an offline-only documentation hub and OTP playground; it does not request authentication/Internet Identity integration.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query-based backend actor creation hook (network-capable integration with an IC canister).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for backend calls/actor wiring for this documentation/playground experience; adding actor creation and query invalidation is out of scope and could introduce network behavior unrelated to OTP extraction.
No backend functionality was requested for the documentation hub or OTP playground; an empty backend module is not part of the stated requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: An additional CSS theme file at frontend/index.css that appears unrelated to the applied theme imported by the app.
hallucinated_features.reason: The app imports ./index.css from frontend/src/main.tsx; adding a second top-level frontend/index.css is not requested and may be redundant/confusing.
